QuestData.Title: Schnottz So Fast
QuestData.Description: I'm nearly ready, $n.$b$bYour scrolls contained enough information to discern their encryption method. Now all that's left is for me to translate the codes.$b$bI need you to scout out the chamber beneath the Obelisk of the Moon. There are likely to be a few of Schnottz's troops down there that escaped your blast.$b$bYou take care of them and I'll meet you there when I'm finished.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Schnottz Elite Troopers in the Chamber of the Moon.
QuestData.RewardText: Alright, $n.$b$bI think everything is in order. Let's do this!
